title: E1 Francis Ford “Cupola” and the Off-Brand Kool-Aid
description:
Get your wine and milkshakes ready - it’s time for the first episode of And That’s Why We Drink! 
Em tells Christine all about one of the most haunted places in America, the Winchester Mystery House. Christine tells Em about the most famous mass suicide in history, though the flavor of the Kool-Aid is still up for debate.
Thanks so much for joining us. If you like this episode, please take a moment to rate and subscribe! #AndThatsWhyWeDrink
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
